title: BugSplat
body: When i start game starts League of Legend sign and than close and show  a bugsplat error.Here is the image https://postimg.org/image/vzcdhqvkv/ , i tried to delete lol cilent and patch and reinstall game and change compatibility mode also tried to run in administrator mode nothing help can someone help ?

replies.body: This error is a common occurence when a driver, game file, or something else is failing to render the game.  I know you've tried a few things already, but there's more to try and rule out possibilities.  Check out the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide for a thorough list of steps to get this fixed.  Hope it helps!
